column1: Art Institute of Chicago////The Art Instute of Chicago is a vast
column3: provocative museum that has something for everyone.  They have art from all eras
column4: ranging from Impressionism to contemporary to  African art.  There is a neat medieval renaissance exhibit tucked in a back corner with horses
column6: and weapons. . There was a gorgeous collection of Middle Eastern and Muslim fabrics
column8: and artifacts on display while we were there.  There are also sculptures
column11: Indian art.  There is something for everyone.  There are also really good audio tours.  This is part of the Chicago City Pass
column12: which is a great value:  the art museum
column16: etc.  This museum is a must do.
